metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2118 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In various functions of Parcel.cpp, there are uninitialized or partiallyinitialized stack variables. These could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-8.0Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-130161842.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
